name: Fake News Detection
desc: Exploring Fake News Detection using Python and NLP: Leveraged ISOT dataset, applied tokenization, stop words removal, lemmatization, and stemming. Built models with SVM algorithm, showcasing proficiency in Python, NLP, and classification

name: Market Basket Analysis
desc: Utilized Apriori Analysis to implement Association Rule Learning on a dataset obtained from the UCI Machine Repository. The objective  is  to generate rules that could assist shop owners in effectively grouping products to boost sales

name: To-Do App
desc: A simple TO-DO app built with ReactJS, MaterializeUI, CSS, HTML, and Javascript. Sign up, log in, and manage your To-Dos effortlessly. Firebase handles secure user authentication.

name: Portfolio
desc: Built a personal portfolio website using Next UI, tailwind css and NextJs.
